article_title: Paris Air Show Refrain: Buy Our Older Jets
article_text:
As Boeing Co. and Airbus Group SE ramp up production of a handful of new jetliners, both are facing the challenge of selling older planes to sustain cash flow and profits until the new models start reaching customers.

On Monday, the Paris Air Show, the aerospace industry’s oldest and largest sales extravaganza for new and advanced models, kicks off with pressure on the two top airline suppliers to book deals for their uncomplicated,...

twitter.description: Boeing and Airbus will show their latest models at the coming Paris Air Show, but both are anxious to book deals that keep production revved up for big moneymakers, the Boeing 777 and Airbus A330.
twitter.creator: @R_Wall

image.alt: Boeing, Airbus air show refrain: Check out our newest jets but please buy older models
